description: Germany's government is facing calls to do more to combat far-right extremism following the attack.
title: Germany shooting: Vigils held for victims of racist attack
title_page: Germany shooting: Vigils held for victims of racist attack - BBC News
maintext: The investigation into the attack is now focusing on whether others knew about or helped organise it, Mr Frank said on Thursday, adding that investigators wanted to establish any links the suspect may have had in Germany or potentially also abroad.
